member.name: T:ComputerBeacon.Json.Parser
member.summary: A class for parsing JSON syntax strings

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.Parser.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parse a JSON string into a JsonObject or JsonArray instance
member.returns: a JsonObject or JsonArray instance, depending on the input string
member.exception: The string contains invalid JSON syntax.

member.name: T:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray
member.summary: JsonArray class

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty JsonArray

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new JsonArray
member.param: JSON string that represents an array
member.exception: JsonString represents JsonObject instead of JsonArray

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.#ctor(System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a JsonArray with initial values

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.Add(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an item to the JsonArray

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items in the JsonArray

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.Contains(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the JsonArray contains a specific value
member.returns: True if the specified value is found in the JsonArray, otherwise False

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.IndexOf(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines the index of the first occurrence of a specific value
member.returns: Index of the first occurrence of the specified value, -1 if the value is not found

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Inserts an item to the JsonArray at the specified index
member.param: Index of item to be inserted
Value of item to be inserted

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.Remove(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the first occurrence of a specified value from the JsonArray

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the item at the specified index
member.param: Index of item to be removed

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.ToString
member.summary: Returns the shortest string representation of the current JsonArray
member.returns: A string representation of the current JsonArray

member.name: M:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.ToString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the string representation of the current JsonArray
member.param: Whether the string is formatted for easy reading
member.returns: A string representation of the current JsonArray

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the object located at the specified index in the JsonArray

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Json.JsonArray.Count
member.summary: The number of objects contained in this JsonArray

member.summary: Custom functions used to deserialize an object to the specified type

member.summary: Custom functions used to serialize an object of the specified type
